::Shadow Wing::

She didn't look up at Lunarpine.  She was to hurt in the spark.  She 
dissapointed herself and worse, dissapointed him.  She wished she had 
been scrapped by the pred.  
She spoke softly, " I can't transform into my beast mode.  I damaged 
a wing. I can't fly for a while. Go one without me. I'll make it back 
to the base."

She really didn't want him to go. But at the same time, she was very 
ashamed of herself and her actions.  Once again, her emotions got her 
in trouble.  And now she worried that she might loose a friend as a 
result.
